Actions.Text: REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION
REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION

Title: Requires class size reduction plans in city school districts in cities having a population of one million or more
Summary: Requires city school districts in cities having a population of one million or more to develop class size reduction plans beginning in September 2022 to reduce the average classroom size citywide, by district, and by school in such districts by the 2027-2028 school year.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring class size reduction plans in city school districts in cities having a population of one million or more
